mapper.select: SELECT d.anno_capacitacion, COUNT(p.id_colegio) AS cantidad_colegio, r.id AS id_region, r.nombre AS nombre_region FROM pnld.docente AS d JOIN pnld.persona AS p ON d.id_persona = p.id_persona JOIN pnld.colegio AS c ON p.id_colegio = c.id JOIN pnld.region AS r ON c.id_region = r.id WHERE d.anno_capacitacion BETWEEN #{fromYear} AND #{toYear} GROUP BY r.nombre, r.id, d.anno_capacitacion ORDER BY r.id
